hypothesis_content.title: Meme Coin (PEPE/DOGE) 15-Minute Volume Spike Reversion
hypothesis_content.statement: Meme coins experiencing >500% volume spike relative to 20-period average on 15-minute chart will revert 70% of the spike's price movement within 90 minutes with >68% probability, regardless of regime.
hypothesis_content.rationale: Meme coin volume spikes often represent coordinated pump/dump attempts or liquidation cascades rather than sustainable moves. Retail exhaustion creates quick reversion opportunities across regimes.
entry_conditions: PEPE or DOGE 15-minute volume > 500% of 20-period average
Entry: Fade the direction of spike on next candle open
Filter: Not during exchange outages or major news events

exit_conditions.stop_loss: Spike continues another 50% in same direction

hypothesis_content.falsification_criteria: Win rate < 60% when excluding the top 5% largest spikes (which may be structural shifts)
